title: Weather App
description: Developed a weather website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, ensuring real-time data retrieval from API for precise forecasts.
features: Seamlessly integrated weather API for up-to-date and accurate weather forecasts, demonstrating expertise in API usage and data manipulation, resulting in a 30% improvement in data retrieval efficiency compared to previous implementations.
Designed an intuitive interface tailored for easy access to weather data, leveraging JavaScript optimizations to enhance interactivity, resulting in a significant 70% boost in user satisfaction.

title: E-commerce Website
description: Engineered an immersive e-commerce platform utilizing fundamental web technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, emphasizing user-friendly design and seamless functionality.
features: Facilitating one-click cart addition and real-time inventory updates for effortless shopping experiences and informed choices, boosting user confidence by 90%.
Employed JavaScript for interactive functionality, event management, data manipulation, and DOM updates to significantly enhance site responsiveness by 85%.
Launched on Netlify, ensuring optimal accessibility and performance for end-users.
